timeline.message: fix: re-enable property transformer for getMembers
fix: minor code fixes, npe checks
fix: re-fetch schema for transformed properties
fix: support field expansion for property transformers

timeline.bodyText: Maybe add a little message to this possible require non null, I guess this is not supposed to happen, but if... a small explanation what is possibly wrong could be nice, will also work as a sort of documentation possibly.
timeline.author: netroms

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it was basically to get rid of a IDE warning.. it has been working for the last 6 years :) there is no reason it would ever be null.
replies.author: mortenoh

timeline.author: netroms
